bioconda.name: bayestyper
bioconda.summary: A method for variant graph genotyping based on exact alignment of k-mers.

biocontainers.name: bayestyper
biocontainers.summary: A method for variant graph genotyping based on exact alignment of k-mers

biotools.summary: Perform genotyping of all types of variation (including SNPs, indels and complex structural variants) based on an input set of variants and read k-mer counts.

bioschemas.name: BayesTyper
bioschemas.summary: Perform genotyping of all types of variation (including SNPs, indels and complex structural variants) based on an input set of variants and read k-mer counts.
